languages.text: Фонтан представляет собой дорогую игрушку для знати: сейчас в нем журчит чистая вода, однако дополнительные трубы явно намекают на наличие отдельных сифонов для игристого вина или иных напитков.

The fountain is an expensive toy for the nobility: pure water is currently bubbling from it, but additional pipes on it indicate the presence of separate siphons for sparkling wine and other beverages.
languages.original_text: Фонтан представляет собой дорогую игрушку для знати: сейчас в нем журчит чистая вода, однако дополнительные трубы явно намекают на наличие отдельных сифонов для игристого вина или иных напитков.

traits.locale_text: The fountain is an expensive toy for the nobility: pure water is currently bubbling from it, but additional pipes on it indicate the presence of separate siphons for sparkling wine and other beverages.

The fountain is an expensive toy for the nobility: pure water is currently bubbling from it, but additional pipes on it indicate the presence of separate siphons for sparkling wine and other beverages.

The fountain is an expensive toy for the nobility: pure water is currently bubbling from it, but additional pipes on it indicate the presence of separate siphons for sparkling wine and other beverages.

The fountain is an expensive toy for the nobility: pure water is currently bubbling from it, but additional pipes on it indicate the presence of separate siphons for sparkling wine and other beverages.

languages.text: この噴水は貴族向けの高級な装飾品だ。綺麗な水がとうとうと噴き出しているが、噴水に増設された配管を見るに、スパークリングワインやその他飲料用の別のサイフォンが設置されていることが分かる。
languages.original_text: The fountain is an expensive toy for the nobility: pure water is currently bubbling from it, but additional pipes on it indicate the presence of separate siphons for sparkling wine and other beverages.

traits.locale_text: この噴水は貴族向けの高級な装飾品だ。綺麗な水がとうとうと噴き出しているが、噴水に増設された配管を見るに、スパークリングワインやその他飲料用の別のサイフォンが設置されていることが分かる。

languages.text: 这个喷泉是贵族们的昂贵玩具。喷泉中目前喷涌的是纯净水，但喷泉上的其他管道表明，这座喷泉里还有单独的虹吸管，用来喷涌气泡酒与其他饮料。
languages.original_text: The fountain is an expensive toy for the nobility: pure water is currently bubbling from it, but additional pipes on it indicate the presence of separate siphons for sparkling wine and other beverages.

traits.locale_text: 这个喷泉是贵族们的昂贵玩具。喷泉中目前喷涌的是纯净水，但喷泉上的其他管道表明，这座喷泉里还有单独的虹吸管，用来喷涌气泡酒与其他饮料。

languages.text: La fuente es un juguete caro para la nobleza: ahora burbujea en ella agua pura, pero las tuberías adicionales indican la presencia de distintos grifos para champán y otras bebidas.
languages.original_text: The fountain is an expensive toy for the nobility: pure water is currently bubbling from it, but additional pipes on it indicate the presence of separate siphons for sparkling wine and other beverages.

traits.locale_text: La fuente es un juguete caro para la nobleza: ahora burbujea en ella agua pura, pero las tuberías adicionales indican la presencia de distintos grifos para champán y otras bebidas.

languages.text: Der Brunnen ist ein kostspieliges Spielzeug für den Adel: Aktuell blubbert darin reines Wasser, aber zusätzliche Rohre deuten darauf hin, dass es separate Zuläufe für Sekt und andere Getränke gibt.
languages.original_text: The fountain is an expensive toy for the nobility: pure water is currently bubbling from it, but additional pipes on it indicate the presence of separate siphons for sparkling wine and other beverages.

traits.locale_text: Der Brunnen ist ein kostspieliges Spielzeug für den Adel: Aktuell blubbert darin reines Wasser, aber zusätzliche Rohre deuten darauf hin, dass es separate Zuläufe für Sekt und andere Getränke gibt.

languages.text: Cette fontaine représente parfaitement les goûts de luxe des nobles. De l'eau pure en jaillit actuellement, mais les différents tuyaux dont elle est dotée semblent indiquer la présence de siphons dédiés d'autres boissons, comme du vin pétillant.
languages.original_text: The fountain is an expensive toy for the nobility: pure water is currently bubbling from it, but additional pipes on it indicate the presence of separate siphons for sparkling wine and other beverages.

traits.locale_text: Cette fontaine représente parfaitement les goûts de luxe des nobles. De l'eau pure en jaillit actuellement, mais les différents tuyaux dont elle est dotée semblent indiquer la présence de siphons dédiés d'autres boissons, comme du vin pétillant.

languages.text: Soylular için pahalı bir oyuncaktan farksız olan pınardan şu an saf su çıkıyor. Üzerindeki diğer borular ise şarap ve diğer içkilerle dolu depolardan da akış olduğunu işaret ediyor.
languages.original_text: The fountain is an expensive toy for the nobility: pure water is currently bubbling from it, but additional pipes on it indicate the presence of separate siphons for sparkling wine and other beverages.

traits.locale_text: Soylular için pahalı bir oyuncaktan farksız olan pınardan şu an saf su çıkıyor. Üzerindeki diğer borular ise şarap ve diğer içkilerle dolu depolardan da akış olduğuna işaret ediyor.
